title: OAMatcher: An Overlapping Areas-based Network for Accurate Local Feature Matching

tldr.text: This work proposes OAMatcher, a Tranformer-based detector-free method that imitates humans behavior to generate dense and accurate matches, and proposes a Match Labels Weight Strategy (MLWS) to generate the coefficients used to appraise the reliability of the ground-truth match labels, while alleviating the influence of measurement noise coming from the data.
